Welcome to the home of the Oxford R Users Group. We are dedicated to bringing together area practitioners of R to exchange knowledge, inspire new users, and spur the adoption of R for innovative research and commercial applications.

For information about upcoming talks and events, please check our meetup page [meetup.com/Oxford-R-User-Group](https://www.meetup.com/Oxford-R-User-Group/). Everyone is welcome! 


## Upcoming events

As of September 2017, we plan to meet on the first Monday of every month in the Dorfman room of St Peter's College, Oxford. 

* 2nd October 2017
    * Speakers TBC
* 6th November 2017
    * Speakers TBC
* 4th December 2017
